description:
Welcome to the I Am Talent Personal Mastery course. We highly recommend that you download the pdf presentation that has the same name as the video lecture in order to gain a full understanding of the topic. The lecturers often refer to the presentation as well as the activities. So please use these to get the best experience possible.

This program is for you if you want to gain a better understanding of yourself, your career options and how to unleash your potential.

We encourage you to take ownership of your future and build the skills required to not only survive but thrive in a dynamically changing and demanding world.

In this highly competitive environment, taking initiative and being proactive will be your blueprint for success.

You need to build your personal brand, discover your strengths and accelerate learning of new skills.

We believe that this course will stimulate ideas, create insight and motivate action toward your career and life decisions.
title: I am Talent
